name: Gunner Archtype
entries: At 2nd level, you select a style of shooting in which to excel. Select either the Quickdraw, Sniper, Demolitionist or Buckshot. Your choice grants you features at 2nd level and again at 6th, 10th, and 14th level. Your Archtype is unique to you, and only you or another character with the same Archtype can utilize a special Firearm detailed in your Subclass.
